subject: Economics
title: Trade Agreements: The Invisible Architecture of Commerce
description: A fast breakdown of Trade Agreements: The Invisible Architecture of Commerce for builders.

hook.text: There are over 350 regional trade agreements in force today.

buildup.text: Trade agreements don't just cut tariffs.

discovery.text: The EU's single market eliminates all internal barriers. A product legal in France is legal in Germany.

twist.text: Modern trade deals often have little to do with trade.

climax.text: Trade agreements shape who benefits from globalization.

punchline.text: The fine print of trade deals matters more than the headlines.

quiz.question: What controversial provision exists in many modern trade agreements?
options: Investor protections that allow corporations to sue governments for policy changes affecting their profits
